attributes.action: Keep coursework based GCSE's for those with dyslexic and learning disability's
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is designed to campaign for coursework based GCSE's for those who have dyslexia and other learning difficulties, who would find it difficult to sit multiple exams for long periods of time.
I feel very strongly about this as I am one of those who suffer from dyslexia and I feel our needs have not be considered by the present government and the changes they have made to examinations
